A)
x5020 - 0101 0000 0010 0000
x1001 - 0001 0000 0000 0001
x1001 - 0001 0000 0000 0001
x103F - 0001 0000 0011 1111
x127F - 0001 0010 0111 1111
x03fb - 0000 0011 1111 1011

B)
x5020 - .ORIG x5020
x1001 - ADD R0, R0, R1
x1001 - ADD R0, R0, R1
x103F - ADD R0, R0, #-1
x127F - ADD R1, R1, #-1
x03FB - BRp x5020

C)
i - 16
ii- 49

D)
Squares the value in R1
